html: I will punish the world "I will visit the world"—, That is, the Babylonish empire; as ,η οικουμενη, for the Roman empire, or for Judea, Luke 2:1; Acts 11:28. So the universus orbis Romanus, for the Roman empire; Salvian. lib. 5 Minos calls Crete his world: " Creten, quae meus est orbis," Ovid. Metamorph. 8:9.
